text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse @FoxNews Trump’s supply chain task force, heavily influenced by Kushner, has been dubbed “the children” inside FEMA headquarters, per @NBCNews. Task force leaders “pushed aside the existing response teams...instead, they first reached out to personal contacts.” https://t.co/JWXln3vGdO
